attributes.name: Precision
attributes.flavour: Improves your chance of a critical strike.

attributes.name: Condition Damage
attributes.flavour: Improves the damage dealt by your conditions.

attributes.name: Ferocity
attributes.flavour: Increases the critical damage you deal.

attributes.name: Concentration
attributes.flavour: Increases the duration of your boons.

attributes.name: Toughness
attributes.flavour: Allows you to withstand direct damage better.
